name: HMCharacteristicMetadata
desc: Metadata that describes a characteristicâ€™s value and that may be useful for presentation purposes.

items.name: var manufacturerDescription: String?
items.desc: A description of the characteristic provided by the accessory manufacturer.

items.name: var validValues: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The subset of valid values supported by the characteristic when the format is of type unsigned integer.

items.name: var minimumValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The minimum value for the characteristic.

items.name: var maximumValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The maximum value for the characteristic.

items.name: var stepValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The minimum interval between values for the characteristic.

items.name: var maxLength: NSNumber?
items.desc: The maximum number of UTF-8 characters allowed in a characteristic that uses a string format.

items.name: var format: String?
items.desc: The format of the values for the characteristic.

items.name: var units: String?
items.desc: The units of the characteristic value.
